name: BALLZ (itch) (Gentle Shark)
description:
You can destroy some weird enemies with a saw attached to your finger. Don't let them get out through the green exit, if they get to it, you lose a life.

Control your weapon by touching the screen in different places. Remember that the arena exactly matches your screen pixel size (which can lead to some problems if your screen is very unusual or old, since the game is in development) and if your finger is in the top right corner, your weapon will also teleport there. The game runs best if your screen is 2400x1080.

And just ignore any inaccuracies in the in-game descriptions, they had been written before the actual playable part was created and will be corrected later on.
